long_description: We've all been there: swaying comfortably in a hammock when you realize you need your pack that is 10 ft. away. The ENO Underbelly gear sling keeps your equipment off the ground and within easy reach. Durable woven-nylon gear sling is designed to hang just below your hammock (sold separately) and can hold up to 50 lbs. of equipment. ENO Underbelly gear sling includes an attached stuff sack.
